text: Rosetta Gagliardi (born 9 February 1895 Milan â€“ 31 July 1975) was an Italian tennis player. She played at the 1920 Summer Olympics and 1924 Summer Olympics. She was a roller skating champion. She was the 1919 Italian singles tennis champion. She competed in the mixed doubles with Cesare Colombo in 1920, and women's doubles with Giulia Perelli, in 1924. == References == Category:1895 births Category:1975 deaths Category:Italian sportspeople Category:Female tennis players Category:Sportspeople from Milan
title: Rosetta Gagliardi
